short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An assistant works together with Socialsales account on WA.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is mainly provided for the Socialsales(CRM SAAS) platform,links your Socialsales account with your Whatsapp account on Whatsapp web app, so you can see your contacts' information in Socialsales on Whatsapp web app.
